info.name: Touhou Feedly
info.description: After Google Reader was retired, I switched over to feedly. As useful as it was, I figured it was time to make a Touhou theme for this.  Enjoy
info.additionalInfo:
1.1 Color fixes, Increased opacity in preview field for better readability
1.2 Color fixes, geared towards touching up Feedly Cloud
2.0 Updated code to CSS3 standard for greater stability
2.1 Added new background image, made color fixes.
2.2 Color fixes; added visibility to pages, particularly for home page's look
2.3 More color fixes; mainly towards search dropdown
2.4 Used different color for Page action buttons for better visibility
